attributes.review: honestly this app was the worst it would crash my phone and had to many ads it’s not worth it a big waste of time.
attributes.title: DONT DOWNLOAD

attributes.review: As a mother of 18 children this is appalling. I own eighteen cars and three chickens. This app was awful. Bothering, ugly, and i think it gave my phone a virus. Don’t get this app. Also, #settleforbiden.
attributes.title: Unbelievable

attributes.review: I am NOT from gen Z. I am a full fledged supporter but this app was HORRID. When I opened the app all I could see was ORANGE. Disgusting. Orange is my least favorite color. Please delete the app and your campaign.
attributes.title: orange screen

attributes.review: i downloaded this app to see what it was all about. but it's slow and poorly formatted. everything about it was just bad. the creator didn't do a great job, and the messages on the app must be wrong because it's just crazy! please don't download this app if you're looking for a pleasant and easy experience. :(
attributes.title: bad!

attributes.review: This app crashed my phone and froze it for a solid 10 minutes.
attributes.title: Serious review

attributes.review: This is so bad the quality is terrible the app itself is very hard to manage and I don’t like how I have to plot info into it it’s so boring worst app everrr
attributes.title: Trump app

attributes.review: i downloaded this app to support the crusty orange, instead the app just messed me up. like my life when down hill. like my house burnt snow cause of it. this app is over dramatic 💀. also it’s racists , and full of pedos with tiny croissants. in addition this app stole my gift cards, smh. even asked me to buy maga merch !!! and the owner of this app, threaten people so , he’s on the canceled list.
attributes.title: gross

attributes.review: I got the app to try and receive updates but all I kept seeing was a white suprematist Cheeto everywhere. Not worth it 👎
attributes.title: ✨dont waste my time✨

attributes.review: I was really excited to get this app to support are loving president but I am very disappointed. I think this app would be better taken off the App Store. Gen Z for life💗
attributes.title: Nasty🤢

attributes.review:
I can’t believe I even thought about downloading this app. Opened it up and it told me to k*ll myself. Pretty rude!!
Not safe for children, or anyone really. REMOVE THIS.
